biotools.summary: Command-line tool for the comparison of protein structures. It provides a simple interface for a large number of common structure comparison tasks. A key feature of the program is the ability to process thousands of structures, either against a single reference protein or in an all-verses-all comparison.

bioschemas.name: MaxCluster
